sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
A curious treatise of the nature and quality of chocolate. VVritten in Spanish by Antonio Colmenero, doctor in physicke and chirurgery. And put into English by Don Diego de Vades-forte Curioso tratado de la naturaleza y calidad del chocolate. English Colmenero de Ledesma, Antonio. Wadsworth, James, 1604-1656?
[6], 21, [1] p.
By I. Okes, dwelling in Little St. Bartholomewes, Imprinted at London : 1640.
Don Diego de Vades-forte = James Wadsworth. A translation of: Curioso tratado de la naturaleza y calidad del chocolate. Running title reads: A curious treatise of chocolate. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======

By I. Okes, dwelling in Little St. Bartholomewes, Imprinted at London : 1640.
Don Diego de Vades-forte = James Wadsworth. A translation of: Curioso tratado de la naturaleza y calidad del chocolate. Running title reads: A curious treatise of chocolate. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
